template.name: Avalon 1166
template.description:
#Canaan AvalonMiner 1166Pro-81 cgminer zabbix monitor https://github.com/dima666d/zbx_AvalonMiner1166Pro-81 Just put "avalon*.sh" files to the Zabbix ExternalScripts directory (/etc/zabbix/externalscripts by default). Required utilites: nc, timeout. only bash, no perl, no python and no etc
If you like my work, please consider donating: BTC: 39DyYL4NxvBv1BTR7RK9UJJisqhTCQhFFa Dmitry Dvinskikh <dima@tevirp.ru>

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} Avalon S restarted less then {$REBOOT_TIME} sec ago

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} Avalon URL {#POOL} of miner was changed
{HOST.NAME} Avalon User {#POOL} of miner was changed
